page.title: 01SOUTH-WEST WILMSLOW
page.content: The{S.W. Wilmslow}area is mainly {quietly undulating mixed farming land. The fields vary in size and shape. Barley, potatoes and grass are grown. About{one quarter of the area}is {residential.}Most of the houses were built in the{20th century.}The housing is mainly{privately owned}and in good condition with well stocked gardens.It is quite a pleasant place to live. The main shops are in central Wilmslow but there are some small local shops such as newsagents, grocers (Spar and Co-op),post offices and butchers. { Sports facilities}are golf,cricket, football and tennis, also there are recreational{parks}and some poorly equipped{playgrounds.} There are several{primary schools}and one private{prep school.}There is a private nursery school on Gravel Lane.
